channel.title: Auto Runescape Update Tracker
channel.description:
The title says it all! Basically, Im making a scar script that will check rs for updates, by trying every ten minutes or so to login, if it says runescape has updated, reload the page, and post here.
PLEASE DO NOT POST HERE! Its currently being tested, so a person like Auto RuneScape Update Checker will post a test message, once its done, ill put it into service on a dedicated computer.
Also, talked with bebe on msn, and its ok if this goes on.

item.title: Auto Runescape Update Tracker

item.title: Auto Runescape Update Tracker
item.dc:creator: @Auto_RuneScape_Updat Auto RuneScape Update Che
item.description:
@Auto_RuneScape_Updat wrote:

haha you double posted

lol
the no posting was just a clutter thing, and by posting, you might have auto notify messages on, and youll get a new message nearly every time you visit this

Well, its still in test, and posting again works fine
Now im gonna make it say what date and time.

But it works very well so far.
of course, its mopar and my special browser specific, so nobody else can use it, if it were to get into wrong hands. (of course, it already is, but that depends on your opinion )

anyone know how to use getsystemtime to get hours and minutes?

Also, i wouldnt want to use socket, because id have to send header, etc manually

Read full topic
